content: HVU2 Anchor capsule Ultimate performing foil capsule for heavy-duty applications in concrete in combination with HAS anchor rods (sold separately) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Chemical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Suitable for cracked concrete and in seismic conditions – even in diamond cored holes included in ESR-4372 for sizes 1/2 to 1 1/4 Soft foil capsules are much tougher and more resilient than glass capsules – little to no risk of breakage Can be installed using impact drivers, drill drivers and hammer drills Automatic hole cleaning (SafeSet) with TE-CD and TE-YD drill bits in combination with a Hilti vacuum cleaner High performance in seismic and static conditions in cracked and uncracked concrete Applications Anchoring steel structures (e.g. racking, guard rails, fences and gates) Anchoring in industry (e.g. machinery, elevators, cranes and industrial equipment) Anchoring applications requiring seismic qualification Anchoring items along roads and in tunnels (e.g. crash and noise barriers, overhead catenary systems) Anchoring at the edge of slabs or on narrow supports (e.g. beams, balconies) For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Anchoring elements: HAS-U threaded rods, HIS-N internally threaded rods Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), Seismic IBC compliance: IBC 2015, IBC 2018 Technical Data | Anchoring elements | HAS-U threaded rods, HIS-N internally threaded rods | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), Seismic | Base material condition (as per approval) | Dry, Wet | IBC compliance | IBC 2015, IBC 2018 | PROFIS Software | Yes | Tested/approved for diamond drilling | Yes | In-service temperature – range | -40 - 248 °F | Storage and transportation temperature range | 41 - 77 °F | Seismic loading | Yes | Installation direction | All | Cleaning procedures | Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning ### ITEMS- 2234726 - Adhesive capsule HVU2 1 1/4 x 12 - Package Size 4 pc Package Contents: - 1x HVU2 M30x270 Adhesive capsule assy - 3627863 - Adh. capsule HVU2 1 1/4x11 MC/20 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 20x HVU2 M30x270 Adhesive capsule assy -
